content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse a website about language learning and travel resources. The website is https://www.anacorteswa.gov/232/Language-Learning-Travel and it offers resources such as Rosetta Stone, Mango Languages, and Duolingo for language learning, as well as travel guides and cultural resources.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The website offers several language learning and travel resources, including Global Road Warrior, Mango Languages, A to Z World Travel, A to Z World Food, and Gale Database - Hospitality and Tourism. \n \n Links: ['Skip to Main Content (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/232/Language-Learning-Travel#cc70cf4744-4456-49eb-adba-205286e5a41b)', ' (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/)', ' (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/Search/Results)', 'Your Government (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/27/Your-Government)', 'For Residents (https://www.anacorteswa.gov/31/For-Residents)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://languagelearningathome.com/blog/2019/11/8/2019-holiday-gift-guide-for-little-language-learners-and-travel-lovers", "question": "What are some language learning and travel gift ideas available on this website?"}}}'}]
"""
